data.name: HoriOrientationFormat
desc: describes the horizontal orientation of an object.
If HorizontalOrientation == HORI_NONE, then the value \"XPos\" describes the distance from the left border of the context. Otherwise \"XPos\" is ignored.
The following flags are used to adapt the position of the object to odd and even pages. If \"PositionToggle\" is set, then the horizontal position is mirrored.

items.name: XPos
lines: contains the distance from the left border.
Only valid if the property HorizontalOrientation contains the value HORI_NONE.

items.name: HorizontalOrientation
lines: determines the horizontal alignment of an object.

items.name: HorizontalRelation
lines: determines the reference position of the horizontal alignment.

items.name: PositionToggle
lines: determines if the orientation toggles between left and right pages.
